body: Apple Intelligence is Apple's latest suite of AI-powered features, designedto integrate deeply into iOS, macOS, and iPadOS. Launched to enhancepersonal devices, it focuses on providing more intuitive, private, andpersonalized user experiences. Key components include advanced languagetools, image editing features, enhanced Siri capabilities, andprivacy-focused on-device processing.In language-related features, Apple Intelligence assists with tasks likeautomatic text rewriting, summarizing content, and prioritizingnotifications based on context. For visual media, users can generateimages, create customized “Genmojis,' and remove unwanted elements fromphotos. Siri's improvements include better context retention and cross-appactions. With a new, immersive design, Siri now supports both voice andtyped requests, and can take actions related to on-screen content, likeadding addresses directly from Messages into contacts  .Privacy is central to Apple Intelligence. Most data processing happensdirectly on devices, ensuring sensitive information remains secure andisn't shared externally. This privacy-conscious AI approach sets AppleIntelligence apart, offering users the benefits of AI without compromisingpersonal data.

Instructor Meera Pradeepan posted a new Note. Your instructor selected to notify everyone in real time of this post, bypassing user email preferences.Extratation Location and TimeHi all! Sorry for the late notice. Extratation today will be from 1pm to 2pm in Doherty A302. As a side note, extratation will always be at this time on Saturdays, but location may vary from week to week. Go to https://piazza.com/class?cid=m3ag24t0iz66zq&nid=m071qhinhhl5bs&token=AVAS26OMT9d to view. Search or link to this question with @144.  Sign up for more classes at http://piazza.com/cmuThanks,The Piazza Team--Contact us at team@piazza.comYou're receiving this email because aarusha@andrew.cmu.edu is enrolled in 07-131 at Carnegie Mellon University. Go to https://piazza.com/login to sign in and manage your email preferences or proceed to https://piazza.com/remove/AVAS26OMT9d/m071qhinhhl5bs to un-enroll from this class.
